dcterms:description: The Mobvoi (SLR87) dataset includes two wake words: 'Hi Xiaowen' and 'Nihao Wenwen'. It contains 144 hours of training data with 43,625 out of 174,592 positive examples, and 74 hours of test data with 21,282 out of 73,459 positive examples.
dcterms:title: Mobvoi (SLR87) dataset
